name: KOMU8
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: KOMU 8 News brings you the latest news, weather, sports and traffic coverage in Columbia, Jefferson City and throughout Mid-Missouri. Add KOMU 8 to your flash briefing and move it to the top of your news in the Settings in the Alexa app. Then, say: "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" to hear the top stories from KOMU 8 News.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
